title: Glitch FX Generators
description:
Over the years, I built a few tools (or multiple versions of the same tool I guess) for generating "glitch" effects from a given input image.

The original was a p5js sketch on OpenProcessing, then a more advanced one was built using Processing. Later on using Python and incorporating more OpenCV, a third version was made to try and take advantage of the command line.

Tested on a few open source images from Unsplash, and incorporated into some of my past artworks.

- [The P5JS Version](https://openprocessing.org/sketch/617537)

- [The Original Processing Verison](https://github.com/anartisticengineer/Glitch-FX-Processing-Version)

- [The Python Version](https://github.com/anartisticengineer/GlitchFX3)
